title: Clean-Yer-Reads pipeline parameters
description: Use Bactopia's read QC steps to Clean-Yer-Reads

input_parameters.title: Required Parameters
input_parameters.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

samples.description: A FOFN (via bactopia prepare) with sample names and paths to FASTQ/FASTAs to process
samples.help: Created using `bactopia prepare`. Cannot be used with `--R1|--R2` or `--SE`

r1.description: First set of compressed (gzip) Illumina paired-end FASTQ reads (requires --r2 and --sample)
r1.help: Requires `--r2` and `--sample`. Cannot be used with `--samples` or `--se`.

r2.description: Second set of compressed (gzip) Illumina paired-end FASTQ reads (requires --r1 and --sample)
r2.help: Requires `--r2` and `--sample`. Cannot be used with `--samples` or `--se`.

se.help: Requires `--sample`. Cannot be used with `--samples` or `--r1 & --r2`

sample.description: Sample name to use for the input sequences

accessions.description: A file containing ENA/SRA Experiment accessions or NCBI Assembly accessions to processed
accessions.header:
### For Downloading from SRA/ENA or NCBI Assembly
  **Note: Downloaded assemblies will have error free Illumina reads simulated for processing.**

accession.description: Sample name to use for the input sequences

check_samples.description: Validate the input FOFN provided by --samples
